"Properties" {
	"Authors" "Areng"
	"Description" 
		{
		"" "Place this item somewhere in the map and choose the gravity. Normal gravity in timer is 15. A number lower than 15 will make the player lighter. A number greater than 15 will make the player heavier."
		"" ""
		"" "__Note__: Place on the exit door to have the player's gravity go back to normal after solving the chamber. That way, gravity is not changed for them in the next chamber they play."
		}
	"Icon"
	{
		"0" "beepkg/gravity_changer.png"
	}
}
